scripts.start-prod: npm run switch-to-prod && stencil build --watch --serve && npm run switch-to-dev
scripts.start-electron-dev: npm run switch-to-native && npm start && npm run switch-to-pwa && npm run --prefix electron start
scripts.start-electron-prod: npm run switch-to-native && npm run start-prod && npm run switch-to-pwa && npm run --prefix electron build
scripts.build-android-dev: npm run switch-to-native && cp -r ./capacitor.config.android-dev.ts ./capacitor.config.ts && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android && npm start && npm run switch-to-pwa
scripts.build-ios-dev: npm run switch-to-native && cp -r ./capacitor.config.ios-dev.ts ./capacitor.config.ts && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios && npm start && npm run switch-to-pwa
scripts.build-android-prod: npm run switch-to-native && npm run start-prod && cp -r ./capacitor.config.android-prod.ts ./capacitor.config.ts && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android && npm run switch-to-pwa
scripts.build-ios-prod: npm run switch-to-native && npm run start-prod && cp -r ./capacitor.config.ios-prod.ts ./capacitor.config.ts && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios && npm run switch-to-pwa
scripts.switch-to-trasteel: cp -r ./src/index-trasteel.html ./src/index.html && cp -r ./src/global/env-apps-trasteel.ts ./src/global/env-apps.ts && cp -r ./firebase-trasteel.json ./firebase.json && firebase use trasteel-consumables
scripts.switch-to-decoplanner: cp -r ./src/index-decoplanner.html ./src/index.html && cp -r ./src/global/env-apps-decoplanner.ts ./src/global/env-apps.ts && cp -r ./firebase-decoplanner.json ./firebase.json && firebase use udive
scripts.switch-to-udive: cp -r ./src/index-udive.html ./src/index.html && cp -r ./src/global/env-apps-udive.ts ./src/global/env-apps.ts && cp -r ./firebase-udive.json ./firebase.json && firebase use udive
scripts.deploy-trasteel: npm run switch-to-pwa && npm run start-prod && rm -r ./functions-trasteel/lib && firebase use trasteel-consumables && firebase deploy --only storage,rules,functions,firestore,hosting:trasteel-consumables
scripts.deploy-udive: npm run switch-to-pwa && npm run start-prod && rm -r ./functions-udive/lib && firebase use udive && firebase deploy --only storage,rules,functions,firestore,hosting:udive
scripts.deploy-decoplanner: npm run switch-to-pwa && npm run start-prod && rm -r ./functions-udive/lib && firebase use udive && firebase deploy --only storage,rules,functions,firestore,hosting:guedecoplanner
scripts.deploy-udive-hosting: npm run switch-to-pwa && npm run start-prod && firebase use udive && firebase deploy --only hosting:udive
scripts.deploy-decoplanner-hosting: npm run switch-to-pwa && npm run start-prod && firebase use udive && firebase deploy --only hosting:guedecoplanner && firebase deploy --only hosting:guedecoplanner
scripts.deploy-trasteel-hosting: npm run switch-to-pwa && npm run start-prod && firebase use trasteel-consumables && firebase deploy --only hosting:trasteel-consumables
scripts.deploy-virtual-tours: firebase use trasteel-consumables && firebase deploy --only hosting:virtual-tours-imrs
scripts.deploy-trasteel-signin: firebase use trasteel-consumables && firebase deploy --only hosting:trasteel-signin
scripts.deploy-trasteel-functions: rm -r ./functions-trasteel/lib && firebase use trasteel-consumables && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy-udive-functions: rm -r ./functions-udive/lib && firebase use udive && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy-trasteel-firestore: firebase use trasteel-consumables && firebase deploy --only storage,rules,firestore
scripts.deploy-udive-firestore: firebase use udive && firebase deploy --only storage,rules,firestore
